dataset.name: viralrecon_illumina_samples
dataset.description:
Samplesheet containing links to minimal Illumina data required to test the nf-core/viralrecon pipeline (v2.5) from end-to-end.
Further information about how the dataset was created can be obtained via the link below:
https://github.com/nf-core/test-datasets/tree/viralrecon#content-of-this-repository
